name: Contagion
description:
Contagion is not the medium by which a contagious disease is transmitted, honestly. We are a company that creates big ideas that start and spread conversations.
These ideas take whatever form best engages the people we’re trying to have a chat with. Today it might be a Facebook or mobile campaign, new product design and traditional media, but tomorrow it could be something completely new. We’re open to finding the very best solutions.
